{"step_by_step_thinking": "Penicillinase is an enzyme that can break down penicillin, rendering it ineffective. Therefore, penicillinase-resistant penicillins are those that can resist this breakdown. According to Document [13], cloxacillin is resistant to being broken down by staphylococcal penicillinase, making it a penicillinase-resistant penicillin.", "answer_choice": "B"}
